verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
All I am - I give to You
A servant of the most high God
Here I am - take my heart
Sit upon the throne of my affection

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All we are we give to you
As servants of the most high God
Here we are take our hearts
Sit upon the throne of our affections

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It's you we love - It's you we want
It's you that we desire to please
We give you now
All glory
May You Lord be honored through us always

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All we are - we give to You
As servants of the most high God
Here we are - take our hearts
Sit upon the throne of our affection
